title: Home front: 1939-1945
creator_credit: Annice Vass and National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
brief_description: Newsreels of Australia during World War II including diggers marching to the war, Prime Minister Curtin addressing the nation, the War Fund Parades, panic buying, the Japanese bombing of Darwin, the Land Army women and the civilian war effort. The final segments look at the Peace celebrations of 1945.
creator_credit_for_label: Annice Vass and National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
